Sci-fi drama, directed by Steven Soderbergh and based on Stanislaw Lem's novel, starring George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Viola Davis, Jeremy Davies and Ulrich Tukur(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A newlywed couple buy a creepy old house, which they hope to turn into their dream home. However, after moving in with their three children, the building's grisly past begins to impact on the present and evil paranormal forces start to strike. Supernatural horror, based on Jay Anson's book, starring James Brolin, Margot Kidder, Rod Steiger and Don Stroud(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw(n)

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: A grieving mother living in India learns of a temple that contains a mysterious portal, through which she would be able to speak to her dead son one last time. She disobeys instructions not to open the portal fully, and disrupts the balance between life and death as the boy's dangerous spirit is unleashed into the world - and worse besides. Horror, starring Sarah Wayne Callies and Jeremy Sisto(n)

programme.title: The Amityville Horror
programme.desc: A newlywed couple buy a creepy old house, which they hope to turn into their dream home. However, after moving in with their three children, the building's grisly past begins to impact on the present and evil paranormal forces start to strike. Supernatural horror, based on Jay Anson's book, starring James Brolin, Margot Kidder, Rod Steiger and Don Stroud(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw(n)

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth

programme.title: Summertime
programme.desc: An ambitious farmer's daughter travels to Paris in 1971, where she falls in love with a radical feminist. She finds herself obliged to return to the family farm, and her new lover accompanies her on the journey, but their relationship is greeted with disapproval. Romantic drama, starring Cecile De France and Izia Higelin. In French

programme.title: The Goob
programme.desc: A teenager spends every summer helping out in his mother's cafe and working on the harvest in the nearby pumpkin fields. The latest harvest season proves a very different one, as tension brews with his mother's new boyfriend and a flirtatious relationship with a foreign worker in the fields makes him consider a different future. Drama, starring Liam Walpole and Marama Corlett

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: African slaves seize control of the vessel transporting them to Spain in 1839. Two surviving Spanish crewmen steer the ship to America, where the slaves are imprisoned for killing their captors - but an abolitionist lawyer argues the case for granting them their freedom. Steven Spielberg's historical drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Morgan Freeman, Matthew McConaughey, Djimon Hounsou, Nigel Hawthorne and Pete Postlethwaite

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A convicted child-killer of towering height and massive build is condemned to death row, but astonishes the guards with his good nature and miraculous healing powers. They believe the gentle giant is incapable of crime, and emotions run high as they realise there is no hope of overturning his death sentence. Supernatural drama, based on a novel by Stephen King, starring Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse and Harry Dean Stanton

programme.title: The Fencer
programme.desc: A champion fencer fleeing from the Soviet secret service inspires Estonian schoolchildren to take up the sport. Drama, starring Mart Avandi and Ursula Ratasepp

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo

programme.title: A Dirty Shame
programme.desc: A bump on the head transforms a sexually repressed housewife into a sex-addicted exhibitionist - who, finding her husband can no longer fulfil her needs, goes in search of satisfaction in Baltimore's seedy underworld. John Waters' comedy, starring Tracey Ullman, Johnny Knoxville, Selma Blair and Chris Isaak

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: Small-town store clerk and unmotivated stoner Mike is enjoying his life with girlfriend Phoebe when his world is suddenly turned upside down. He is unaware he is actually a highly trained, lethal government sleeper agent who has been targeted for assassination, forcing him to summon his inner action-hero in order to survive. Action comedy, starring Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Two middle-aged men embark on a wine-tasting tour in California a week before one of them is due to be married. The groom-to-be is determined to persuade his self-hating, embittered friend to loosen up - while also making it clear he intends to cheat on his fiancee before the week is out. Comedy, starring Paul Giamatti, Thomas Haden Church, Virginia Madsen and Sandra Oh

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: A gangster's widow blames herself for her husband's death, as she becomes the subject of malicious rumours that she drove him to a life of crime. A man who is also widowed falls in love with her, but his daughter is determined to stop them from marrying. Comedy, starring Sophia Loren, Anthony Quinn, Ina Balin and Peter Mark Richman

programme.title: The Brand New Testament
programme.desc: God secretly lives in Brussels, spending his time enacting spiteful punishments on the human race. His rebellious daughter tries to teach him a lesson by sending everyone on Earth a message containing the date of their death. As the world is plunged into chaos, she flees from her furious father - who gains a new insight into his creation. Comedy, starring Pili Groyne, Benoit Poelvoorde and Catherine Deneuve. In French and German

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: An imaginative youngster with dreams of being an inventor grows up to be a downtrodden single mother, struggling to support her chaotic family. She sees a chance to turn all their lives around when inspiration strikes and she creates a new household tool, but faces the challenge of selling her product in the demanding world of a home shopping TV station. Fact-based drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro and Bradley Cooper

programme.title: American Beauty
programme.desc: A suburban family man has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with a friend of his teenage daughter. Struggling to cope with the unhealthy attention her father is lavishing on her friend, the girl begins a tentative relationship of her own, while her harassed mother is also having an affair. Sam Mendes' Oscar-winning black comedy drama, starring Kevin Spacey, Annette Bening, Thora Birch, Mena Suvari and Wes Bentley

programme.title: God's Pocket
programme.desc: A construction worker believes his life will be simpler following the death of his troublemaking stepson. However, he finds things go from bad to worse as his relationship with his wife deteriorates and a reporter grows suspicious about the tragedy. Drama based on Peter Dexter's novel, starring Philip Seymour Hoffman, Christina Hendricks and John Turturro(n)

programme.title: Men & Chicken
programme.desc: Two brothers discover they are adopted, and go in search of their biological father, a reclusive scientist. The search leads them to their three eccentric half-brothers, who live together on an island, and a shocking revelation about their father's research. Comedy, starring David Dencik and Mads Mikkelsen. In Danish(n)

programme.title: When Animals Dream
programme.desc: A teenager lives in a remote town with her troubled father and catatonic mother, unaware of the terrible secrets concealed in the community. As she comes to terms with her sexuality, she is also confronted with an ancient curse and a threat to both her family and the entire town. Horror, starring Sonia Suhl and Lars Mikkelsen. In Danish and Spanish(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films(n)

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: During a freezing cold winter in the frozen woods of an isolated Maine logging town, a lapse of concentration has devastating consequences for a school bus driver. Drama, starring Amy Morton, John Slattery and Louisa Krause(n)

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith(n)

programme.title: Valley of Love
programme.desc: An estranged couple meet for the first time in years in Death Valley, California, having responded to a message left for them by their dead son, who committed suicide six months previously. They are instructed to visit a series of locations in the desert, with the promise that their son's ghost will appear to them. Drama, starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu. In French and English(n)

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire(n)

programme.title: The Commune
programme.desc: A couple establish a commune in a large house in 1970s Copenhagen, encouraging anyone who wants to escape the outside world to join them and their daughter. A succession of unusual characters pass through the collective, but their supposed utopia looks set to be torn apart by an affair within the group. Drama, starring Ulrich Thomsen and Fares Fares. In Danish(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: Brash yuppie car dealer Charlie discovers his deceased father has left the family fortune to Raymond, the autistic elder brother he never knew he had. In a bid to get his hands on the money, he tracks down and abducts Raymond - but the ensuing cross-country journey proves to be a profound learning experience. Oscar-winning drama, starring Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman, with Valeria Golino, Gerald R Molen and Jack Murdock(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic of Notorious BIG, whose rise to fame took him from being a Brooklyn street hustler and crack dealer to become a respected and influential rap artist, before he was brutally murdered at the age of 24. Starring Jamal Woolard, Derek Luke, Dennis LA White and Angela Bassett(n)

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: A woman on the run after stealing from her boss ends up at an isolated motel, where the owner's curious relationship with his domineering mother results in murder. Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire(n)

programme.title: The Player
programme.desc: A paranoid film studio executive will stop at nothing to get what he wants. However, he soon has to contend with a disgruntled scriptwriter's revenge plot, a suspicious detective and the ambition of a determined rival. Robert Altman's Hollywood satire, starring Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Whoopi Goldberg and Richard E Grant, as well as a host of stars playing themselves in cameo appearances

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna

programme.title: Short Circuit 2
programme.desc: Manic mechanoid Johnny Five meets an old friend in New York City and embarks on a fact-finding tour - but ends up entangled in a series of escapades culminating in a bank robbery. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Fisher Stevens, Michael McKean, Cynthia Gibb and Jack Weston, with the voice of Tim Blaney

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: A timid farmer abandoned by his girlfriend is fascinated by a mysterious woman who rides into his frontier town. He tries to act the part of a gunslinging Wild West hero to impress her, only to find himself facing a showdown with her notorious outlaw husband. Western spoof, directed by and starring Seth MacFarlane, with Charlize Theron and Liam Neeson

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: An old man tells a journalist the story of his youth as a lobby boy at a hotel in Eastern Europe in the 1930s. He was taken under the wing of the establishment's dashing concierge, and is drawn into his misadventures as he becomes involved in a conflict over a valuable painting. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Ralph Fiennes, Tony Revolori, F Murray Abraham and Jude Law

programme.title: The Last Picture Show
programme.desc: Three teenagers living in an economically struggling town in the backwoods of Texas face an uncertain future. When a tragedy strikes the community, they are forced to choose between making the best of their lives at home or seeking their fortune elsewhere. Peter Bogdanovich's drama, starring Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Timothy Bottoms, Cloris Leachman and Ben Johnson

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrer's unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wife's sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: It Came from Beneath the Sea
programme.desc: The captain of a nuclear submarine battles a gigantic octopus threatening to destroy San Francisco. Monster adventure, starring Kenneth Tobey, Faith Domergue and Donald Curtis, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: An arrogant Austrian mountaineer tries to become the first to conquer a peak in India that has claimed the lives of 11 previous climbers. However, the outbreak of the Second World War leaves him languishing in a PoW camp. He escapes and ends up in the holy city of Lhasa, where he befriends the 14-year-old Dalai Lama and learns the meaning of inner peace. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, David Thewlis and BD Wong

programme.title: The Monuments Men
programme.desc: Seven experts in fine art are assembled into a military platoon during the Second World War, and given an unusual mission. They are sent into occupied Europe to recover priceless works of art that have fallen into Nazi hands and ensure the masterpieces survive the conflict. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring George Clooney. With Matt Damon, Bill Murray and Cate Blanchett

programme.title: The Counsellor
programme.desc: A lawyer who earns a living representing drug dealers makes a fateful decision to take an active role in their criminal activities. He quickly finds himself out of his depth in a criminal underworld he barely understands, where his actions bring deadly consequences. Ridley Scott's crime thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Penelope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Javier Bardem and Brad Pitt

programme.title: Suzanne
programme.desc: A woman makes a series of life choices that have effects on the rest of her family, including deciding to abandon her son to goes on the run with a drug dealer- leaving her father and sister to take care of the child. Katell Quillevere's romantic drama, starring Sara Forestier, Paul Hamy, Francois Damiens and Adele Haenel. In French(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond(n)

programme.title: The Night of the Grizzly
programme.desc: Marshal Jim Cole leaves his job, packs up his family and heads out to the high plains and mountains of Wyoming when he inherits his uncle's ranch. However, any hopes of a quiet life raising livestock are soon dashed by a greedy neighbour, an ex-con turned bounty hunter and the emergence from hibernation of a vicious grizzly bear known to the locals as Satan. Western, starring Clint Walker(n)

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An LAPD cop discovers a psychopathic criminal has planted a bomb on a crowded bus, primed to go off if the vehicle drops below 50mph. He boards the vehicle and helps the hapless passenger who has been forced to take the wheel to keep a constant speed to avoid a disaster. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Sandra Bullock, Dennis Hopper and Jeff Daniels(n)

programme.title: Immortals
programme.desc: A power-mad ancient Greek king raises an army with the intention of not only conquering the known world, but using a mystical weapon to unleash the legendary titans and overthrow the gods. The immortal deities are unable to interfere directly, so select a mortal man to be their champion and defeat the tyrant. Mythological adventure, starring Henry Cavill and Mickey Rourke(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy agrees to work for a local man in exchange for a car, but ends up being taken for a ride when the scoundrel reneges on the deal

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charlie and Laura go to the aid of their old friend Mr Edwards, who is suffering from depression

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A pair of conniving con artists set out to swindle the residents of Walnut Grove by persuading Jonathan Garvey he is a sure bet to win a wrestling championship. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: The War Bride
programme.desc: A cockney seamstress marries a Canadian serviceman after a whirlwind romance in London during the Second World War. She is sent to live with his family on their farm in a backwater of Alberta until the conflict is over, but she struggles to get along with her dour in-laws, who make no attempt to welcome her. Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano

programme.title: Unlikely Angel
programme.desc: An egotistical singer dies and goes to Heaven, but is refused entry unless she can prove herself to be less self-centred. Returning to Earth, she finds a job as nanny to a bereaved family - but all her good turns seem to backfire. Fantasy, starring Dolly Parton, Brian Kerwin, Roddy McDowall and Maria Del Mar

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson

programme.title: Working Miracles
programme.desc: A janitor wakes from a coma to discover he has gained the life-changing ability to heal people just by touching them. He soon becomes a minor celebrity, but the gift takes its toll on his health and relationship with his fiancee. Drama, starring Eddie Cibrian, Lisa Sheridan and Darcy Rose Byrnes

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: A family moves into a new housing development built on a graveyard, and soon the residents start to experience disturbing supernatural phenomena. Thriller, starring Patty Duke, David Selby and Kiersten Warren

programme.title: Unlikely Angel
programme.desc: An egotistical singer dies and goes to Heaven, but is refused entry unless she can prove herself to be less self-centred. Returning to Earth, she finds a job as nanny to a bereaved family - but all her good turns seem to backfire. Fantasy, starring Dolly Parton, Brian Kerwin, Roddy McDowall and Maria Del Mar

programme.title: Roots
programme.desc: Period drama following the history of a black American family, beginning with the story of a man living in Gambia who is kidnapped by slave traders and taken to the New World

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Problems arise during John-Boy's first day at Boatwright College

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A travelling preacher sets up shop in Walnut Grove and becomes so popular that people stop going to church, preferring his sermons over those delivered by the Rev Alden. Unfortunately, he also dabbles in faith healing - with tragic consequences. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family rallies round and tries to lift Grandfather Holbrook's spirits after the death of his wife by suggesting he write a book. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Barry Sullivan

programme.title: The Cry
programme.desc: Part one of two. Psychological thriller about a bereaved mother who becomes obsessed with another woman's baby. Still grieving over her own loss, child protection officer Meg Bartlet befriends new mother Christine Rearden, but the relationship turns sour when Meg sets out to prove baby Eleanor's breathing problems are the result of abuse. Starring Sarah Lancashire, Emma Cunniffe, Anthony Calf, James Laurenson and Joe Duttine

programme.title: A Carol Christmas
programme.desc: A self-interested TV talk-show host with heaps of money and a bad attitude vows to pull out all the stops to ensure she avoids any hint of seasonal goodwill, a plan that falls to pieces when three ghosts pay her an unscheduled visit to teach her a lesson. Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner

programme.title: Tears in the Rain
programme.desc: An American woman tries to fulfil her mother's dying wish by delivering a letter to an English lord, who denies ever having known her. When she falls in love with his son, the suspicious aristocrat delves into the American's past - only to realise she may be his daughter. Romantic drama, starring Sharon Stone and Christopher Cazenove

programme.title: Terry

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family travels to a nearby town for the annual fair, where Caroline takes part in a competition for perfect pickles. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: Shattered Family
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about an 11-year-old boy who fought his natural mother in court to win the right to live with a caring adoptive family. Starring Richard Crenna, Rhea Perlman and Linda Kelsey

programme.title: Custody of the Heart
programme.desc: An outgoing, ambitious career woman divides her time between work, family and caring for her elderly mother. Drama, starring Lorraine Bracco, Martin Donovan, Dennis Boutsikaris and John Neville

programme.title: Roots

programme.title: Grace Is Gone

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Dallas: The Early Years
programme.desc: Prequel to the long-running American soap, exploring the origins of the feud between the Ewing and Barnes oil dynasties. Family patriarchs Digger and Jock become friends as they seek their fortune during the Depression, but greed and love for the same woman turns them into bitter enemies. Drama, starring David Marshall Grant and Dale Midkiff, and featuring an introduction with Larry Hagman(n)

programme.title: William and Kate: Into the Future
programme.desc: Documentary about the royal couple's relationship, that examines what the future may hold(n)

programme.title: Straight from the Heart
programme.desc: A jilted New York woman despairs of ever finding the man of her dreams, until a personal ad leads to contact with a lonesome cowboy. Leaving the city behind her, she heads west to start a new life at his side - but their relationship struggles because of their differences. Romantic drama, starring Teri Polo, Andrew McCarthy, Greg Evigan and Christine Tucci(n)

programme.title: Roots
programme.desc: Kunta is seriously injured by slave catchers during the war of Independence, but later gets married and has a daughter. He is soon forced to choose between family and freedom(n)

programme.title: It Was Him or Us
programme.desc: A survivor of domestic abuse who has made a fresh start tries to persuade her daughter to leave her new boyfriend, who has a violent nature she recognises from her own marriage. When he shows his true colours, she ends the relationship, but he does not take kindly to the rejection. Drama, starring Ann Jillian, Richard Grieco and Monique Lanier(n)

programme.title: And Baby Will Fall
programme.desc: A woman expecting her first child after several miscarriages is reunited with a school friend, who is also pregnant. When her old acquaintance goes missing, she begins to suspect her husband may have been having an affair that ended in murder. Thriller based on Hallie Ephron's novel Never Tell a Lie, starring Anastasia Griffith, Brendan Fehr and Clea Duvall

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy agrees to work for a local man in exchange for a car, but ends up being taken for a ride when the scoundrel reneges on the deal

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family help their relatives to make a stand against the authorities, following the issuing of an eviction notice

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charlie and Laura go to the aid of their old friend Mr Edwards, who is suffering from depression

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A pair of conniving con artists set out to swindle the residents of Walnut Grove by persuading Jonathan Garvey he is a sure bet to win a wrestling championship. Drama, starring Michael Landon

programme.title: The War Bride
programme.desc: A cockney seamstress marries a Canadian serviceman after a whirlwind romance in London during the Second World War. She is sent to live with his family on their farm in a backwater of Alberta until the conflict is over, but she struggles to get along with her dour in-laws, who make no attempt to welcome her. Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young

programme.title: Visions of Terror
programme.desc: A police psychologist begins counselling a traumatised cop whose partner died in the line of duty, and soon realises there is more to the case than meets the eye. Crime drama, starring Barbara Eden, Ted Marcoux and David Marciano

programme.title: Unlikely Angel
programme.desc: An egotistical singer dies and goes to Heaven, but is refused entry unless she can prove herself to be less self-centred. Returning to Earth, she finds a job as nanny to a bereaved family - but all her good turns seem to backfire. Fantasy, starring Dolly Parton, Brian Kerwin, Roddy McDowall and Maria Del Mar

programme.title: A Touch of Hope
programme.desc: A man discovers he has the abilities of a faith healer. Initially reluctant, he agrees to use his gift to help doctors, but only in emergency cases. However, many in the medical community are suspicious of his claims, a conflict that comes to a head when he is asked to bring a doubting doctor's daughter out of a coma. Fact-based drama, starring Anthony Michael Hall, CCH Pounder, Abraham Benrubi and Fay Masterson

programme.title: Working Miracles
programme.desc: A janitor wakes from a coma to discover he has gained the life-changing ability to heal people just by touching them. He soon becomes a minor celebrity, but the gift takes its toll on his health and relationship with his fiancee. Drama, starring Eddie Cibrian, Lisa Sheridan and Darcy Rose Byrnes

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: A family moves into a new housing development built on a graveyard, and soon the residents start to experience disturbing supernatural phenomena. Thriller, starring Patty Duke, David Selby and Kiersten Warren

programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered

programme.title: My Nation
programme.desc: The internet was hailed for democratizing ideas. But it is also an arena where conspiracy theories and polarizing echo chambers thrive. In this episode, meet an Alt-Right organizer who's using his social network to urge online sympathizers to join his real world rebellion; the desperate parents of a 17-year-old girl, brainwashed into posting White Nationalist YouTube videos; plus, an American-born former Al-Qaeda recruiter who's had a prolific effect on support for jihad(c)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Carmen and her brother Juni think they're typical kids until they discover their parents are former spies who've been kidnapped by a sinister children's show host. Now it's up to a brother-sister duo to rescue their parents and find out if master spy skills run in the family in this family adventure starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Spy Kids: Game Over
programme.desc: Under-age agents Juni and Carmen Cortez journey inside the virtual reality world of a 3-D video game designed to outsmart them, as the awe-inspiring graphics and creatures of gaming come to real life. Relying on lightning-quick reflexes, the Spy Kids must battle through tougher and tougher levels of the game, facing challenges that include racing against road warriors and surfing on boiling lava, in order to save the world from a power hungry villain

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought

programme.title: Spy Kids: Game Over

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: Golden Frog Time
programme.desc: Chuck finds he has much at stake in the success of a new business venture; Senior, too, is heavily invested. Meanwhile, Axe takes out a massive short and takes steps to insure its failure. Wendy wrestles with a familiar and uncomfortable position: caught between Axe and Chuck(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.desc: The gang moves to a secret location in the countryside and starts training to be soldiers. But the strain of being on the run begins to take its toll on Jas and Marcus' relationship. At the country house, the gang meets Eliette, a French Canadian radical who inspires Jas. In London, meanwhile, Pence and Cullen are getting desperate: the gang are becoming notorious and there's a rival force trying to steal the case. Pence turns to Kenya for help(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: My Nation
programme.desc: The internet was hailed for democratizing ideas. But it is also an arena where conspiracy theories and polarizing echo chambers thrive. In this episode, meet an Alt-Right organizer who's using his social network to urge online sympathizers to join his real world rebellion; the desperate parents of a 17-year-old girl, brainwashed into posting White Nationalist YouTube videos; plus, an American-born former Al-Qaeda recruiter who's had a prolific effect on support for jihad(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2017 AVN Awards
programme.desc: Considered the industry's highest honor, the AVN Awards celebrates outstanding achievements in the world of adult entertainment in categories that recognize performers, directors, retailers, websites and more. Featuring rap sensation Flo Rida, adult superstars Riley Reid and Aspen Rae, with comedian co-host Colin Kane(n)

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star(n)

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in this thriller as a divorced boat builder who believes his 11-year-old son is lying about witnessing his new step-dad (Vince Vaughn) committing a murder, until a little investigation reveals that the new man in his family's life is not who he claims to be. Teri Polo costars(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him(n)

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Medium Raw
programme.desc: Detective Johnny Morgan finally tracks down the deranged serial killer that kidnapped and murdered his sister 20 years earlier but is disappointed when the fiend receives life imprisonment in an insane asylum instead of the death penalty. Visiting the prisoner intending to exact revenge, Johnny is instead trapped inside the institution when a power outage frees the inmates and seals off all escape routes. Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Christmas Eve hijinks put Frank Cross (Bill Murray) in a ghostly time warp in this take-off of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol." Cross, who has made the meteoric rise from the depths of the mailroom to TV network president, is a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over he'll be visited by a maniacal New York cab driver from the past, a present-day fairy who's into pratfalls and, finally, a ghoulish, seven-foot headless messenger from the future

programme.title: Dressed to Kill

Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar(n)

programme.title: In My Father's House
programme.desc: Award winning documentary following hip-hop artist Che "Rhymefest" Smith - co-writer of the 2015 Oscar winning song "Glory" from the motion picture 'Selma' and 2005 Grammy winner for the song "Jesus Walks" with Kanye West - as he moves into his childhood home on Chicago's South Side and hesitantly sets out to reconnect with his estranged father, the man who abandoned him over twenty years ago(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara(n)

programme.title: Born To Be Blue
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke stars as jazz legend Chet Baker in this biopic that zeroes in on a key moment in the 1960s, just as the all-but-washed-up musician attempts to stage a comeback, spurred in part by a passionate romance with a new flame(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson

programme.title: The Fifth Estate
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars as WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange in this dramatic thriller based on real events. In a quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power, an Internet startup becomes the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization

programme.title: The Ladykillers (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Tom Hanks stars in this Coen Brothers slapstick comedy as a devious criminal hiding beneath the persona of a silver-tongued southern gentleman so that he can commit the heist of the century by tunneling through his churchgoing landlady's cellar to a casino's vault of riches

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Sexual Sanctuary
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about an English couple who are invited to a strange villa where nothing is as it seems. After a series of desperate moves and sexual advances by the villa's inhabitants, will Aaron and Katie figure out what's really going on or will their new infatuations blind them from the truth?

programme.title: The Nasty Show hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: In this comedy special, the legendary Artie Lange hosts a line up of the most deranged and hilarious minds in comedy that's not for the faint of heart. Features Mike Wilmot, Mike Ward, Gina Yashere, Luenell, Jimmy Carr and Gilbert Gottfried

programme.title: Hesher
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as in this coming-of-age story as a metal head who unexpectedly enters the life of a grieving family and takes on the unlikely role of helping a 13-year-old boy cope with the death of his mother

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Teenage buddies Cisco (Jorge Lendeborg Jr.), Junior (Moises Arias), Boobie (Ezri Walker), and Patty Cake (Rafi Gavron) shrug off school to practice skateboarding, which they hope will be their ticket to a better life. But when they get mixed up in a drug deal and cross a ruthless crime queen-pin (Linda Emond), they put their friendship—and lives—on the line. Set to a hip-hop soundtrack and featuring an ensemble cast that includes Michael K. Williams, Erykah Badu and rapper Machine Gun Kelly(n)

programme.title: The Riot Club
programme.desc: A first year student at Oxford University is invited to join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single drunken, debauched and disturbing evening with dangerous consequences(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all(n)

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth(n)

programme.title: ONE & DONE/BEN SIMMONS
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports chronicles the sprawling journey of number one NBA draft pick Ben Simmons. From a relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in America to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league, ONE & DONE chronicles a pivotal period in a young man's life, capturing Simmons and his inner circle as they realize a lifelong dream in the limelight of an exclusive fraternity of top NBA draft picks(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: Sweeping epic set in apartheid-era South Africa about white journalist Donald Woods (Kevin Kline), who is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death of black activist Stephen Biko (Denzel Washington)(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr(n)

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident(n)

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes and Jude Law star in this riveting account of the 1942-43 Battle of Stalingrad from the Russian point of view. Talented sharpshooter Vassili is a rural youth who becomes a national hero by almost single-handedly holding back the German assault. That is, until the Nazis send a gifted gunslinger of their own to the besieged city, his sole mission to assassinate Vassili

credits.writer: Adult Content, Graphic Violence, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2017 AVN Awards

programme.title: Chappie

Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up

Jim Rome's on Showtime and everything's fair game. The Headline: John Wall, Melvin Gordon. Ten Questions: Dana White. Front Row: Amy Van Dyken. Forum: Jay Feely, Jeff Pearlman, Jerry Stackhouse(c)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A former tobacco executive, fired by his employer, becomes a paid consultant for a story regarding unethical practices within that controversial industry. But what begins as a temporary alliance leads to a lengthy battle for both men to save their reputations, and much, much more. Academy Award® winners Al Pacino and Russell Crowe co-star

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: In the 1870s Wild West, a peaceful American settler kills his family's murderer, which unleashes the fury of a notorious gang leader who is hell bent on hunting the settler down, in this blood spattered saga of sin and redemption. Stars Eva Green

programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Released from prison after taking the fall for a group of his friends, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) just wants to get his life on track. But when he takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan) and reconnects with his old friend Willie (Joaquin Phoenix), Leo finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs and murder. Featuring Charlize Theron, Faye Dunaway and Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: The new kid in town (Alex Pettyfer) is a nomad who discovers, when mysterious assassins track him down, that he's from a lot farther away than he ever knew. Dianna Agron and Timothy Olyphant costar in this sci-fi teen thriller

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy

programme.title: Captivity
programme.desc: A supermodel is kidnapped and imprisoned in a cell by an obsessed psychopath, then subjected to horrific mental and physical torture in this controversial horror film starring Elisha Cuthbert and Pruitt Taylor Vince, directed by Roland Joffe

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: Bill Pullman plays Fred Madison, a man who begins receiving disturbing video tapes of him and his wife (Patricia Arquette) sleeping. When the final tape shows Fred murdering his wife he is sent off to death row. Here Fred inexplicably becomes young Pete Dayton (Balthazar Getty), who leads a completely different life. Ultimately, the two identities begin to cross paths in this surreal, suspenseful web of intrigue from director David Lynch

programme.title: Who's Your Caddy?
programme.desc: Denied membership in an exclusive Hamptons country club, the millionaire rapper C-Note (Antwan Andre Patton) pulls off a clever real estate deal that guarantees him admission but also touches off a war with the club's snobby elite.
